name: Statistical Tests
description: Calculates statistical tests and creates a report with the results

inputs.name: ad-sample-size
inputs.description: The number of samples to be used during the normality test

inputs.name: ad-seed
inputs.description: A string to be hashed to generate deterministic samples for the Anderson-Darling normality test.

outputs.name: summary
outputs.description: Summary results aggregating metrics from all numeric fields

outputs.name: tests-results-dataset
outputs.description: Dataset with the results of the tests for each field
